answers.answer: Do anything and everything u like as ur mood swings in first trimester.

1. Stay away from big fish that are known to have mercury2. Do not eat unpasteurized dairy products3. Meat and eggs must be cooked thoroughly4. Drink lots of water cause it also helps ease constipation5. Limit your sugar and caffeine intake to one serving per day cause you could get gestational diabetes6. Eat lots of veggies and fruit to stay healthyThese are some of the advice I got from the nurse.

Dont panick if u feel cramping its normal through the whole pregnancy as long as u arnt bleeding, drink a ton of water to avoid headaches! Eat stuff with fiber near the end of the first trimester or if u get constipated(i didnt want to use one of the kinds u mix with water so i eat the nutrigrain bars:)) if ur suffering from morning sickness, eat before u get out of bed, and eat small meals throughout the entire day, if u keep ur belly full u dont get as sick! Dont take any medications without talking to your dr first unless its tylenol extra strength which is the only pain medication i know u can take. Good luck hun!
Dont stress about the do's and don'ts. Your body will tell you want you cant eat or do.

question: First time mommy anybody have any idea on what to do nd not to do to be careful during the first trimester and what's normal to happen and what's not.
title: Do's nd Don'ts?
